entry.title: Orchard Beginner Module 1 : Getting Started (Completed)
entry.content:
Orchard Beginner Module 1 : Getting Started completed.

Orchard CMS Tutorials brought to you by Orchard Beginner http://orchardbeginner.com/

Note: As I had mentioned in one of my previous post that I will be keeping track of every task I do and blog about it online.

New to Orchard CMS?

Orchard CMS is a free, open source, community-focused Content Management System built on the ASP.NET MVC platform.

Orchard is delivered under the .NET Foundation http://www.dotnetfoundation.org/orchard. For more info on Orchard visit the official website http://www.orchardproject.net/ and for more Orchard CMS tutorials subscribe to our Orchard Beginner YouTube channel or bookmark Orchard Beginner website for future reference.

Stay tuned.

Take care!

Abhishek Luv

entry.title: Orchard Beginner YouTube Channel Launched
entry.content:
Introducing the Orchard Beginner YouTube Channel.

Orchard Beginner is created with the aim to provide users and developers to have a Beginner’s Guide to learn the ins and outs of Orchard.

As I had mentioned in one of my previous post that I will be keeping track of every task I do and blog about it online.

Stay tuned!!

entry.title: Welcome to Orchard Beginner
entry.content:
Orchard Beginner is created with the aim to provide users and developers to have a Beginner’s Guide to learn the ins and outs of Orchard.

We begin with the Basics of Orchard i.e. Talking about Basic site management, User management and then we step into more important features of Orchard like Queries, Projector, Taxonomies, Custom Forms, Workflows and Recipes.

After that we’ll talk about how to Get Started with Theme Development in Orchard and later on Module Development too.

Again Welcome To Orchard Beginner.

Orchard Beginner

Happy Orcharding!!
